MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:00am to safely carry out repairs works on our underground cable network for properties on Arthur Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:43am on Tuesday, 24 November 2020
